Zack,
             If I was a bee keeper, I probably would try to get a recording of the constant buzzing.  I bet that could actually work as a form of white noise, LOL.  
   
  

Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
          
I've never been able to make honey. It's one thing you can't synthesize. 
Since I'm not a bee, I rely on the bees to make honey for me.

But that's about the only thing I haven't tried to make at one time or 
another.
:-)

On Sun, 13 Apr 2008, Nathan Sharman wrote:

> Not every one can make their own Honey. That is why those who can should make for others.
>
